# PED::SET_PED_MIN_GROUND_TIME_FOR_STUNGUN

## Summary
Override the minimum time this ped should stay on the ground for when hit by a stun gun

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT** minTime:
The time the ped should stay on the ground for (in milliseconds).
Use -1 to revert to the default code controlled value.

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Ped will stay on the ground after being stunned for at lest ms time. (in milliseconds)
